description: Detects netsh commands that configure a port forwarding of port 3389 used for RDP Author: Florian Roth, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Netsh RDP Port Forwarding
query: (process.executable:*\\netsh.exe AND process.command_line:*i* AND process.command_line:*\ p* AND process.command_line:*\=3389* AND process.command_line:*\ c*)
